author: psmith
msg: Added a button to the WelcomePanel mini toolbar that displays
an example Log4j.xml configuration file with a number of Receivers
configured, all within the Welcome Panels html display.

author: psmith
msg: Changed Welcome Panel into nearly a fully fledged browser.
Added Home, and back button support.  You can now click on links in
the browser and they actually go somewhere!.
This was a lot easier than I thought!

author: psmith
msg: Beginnings of better documentation in Welcome panel.
added discussion of Receivers, and and what you could do with a
SocketAppender. added links to SocketAppender javadoc on Jakarta

author: psmith
msg: Fixed bug where a SmallButton could be 'clicked' (visibly the border changed)
even though it didn't do anything.
added disable checking which ignores the mouse when inactive.
